title: Media
body: The Media plugin provides the ability to record and play back audio files on a device.
// Create a Media instance.  Expects path to file or url as argument
// We can optionally pass a second argument to track the status of the media
// skip to 10 seconds (expects int value in ms)
// iOS simply create a new instance and the old one will be overwritten
// Android you must call release() to destroy instances of media when you are done
Some hints if you are using iOS and recording doesn't work: 1.) Try to use a absolute file path but remove beginning "file://". Then it looks like:
2.) If that's not working, too, create the file before using. Example:
